name: QUERY;
description:
QUERY;

Test your SQL skills by building a query to answer a daily question. You have 5 attempts to craft the correct solution. Will you be able to solve the daily puzzle? 

Be sure to come back each day to test your skills and keep your streak going!

Download Details

Mac Users: You will want to download the app via the Apple App Store link provided below.

Windows Users:  QUERY; is currently not supported on Windows devices. This may be added in the future if there is enough interest.
